title: 294 31 "Resounding Bad News! Buster Call Invoked!"Transliteration: "Hibikiwataru Kyōhō! Hatsudō Basutā Kōru!" (Japanese:響き渡る凶報! 発動バスターコール!) Hiroyuki Kakudō Koga Naoki January 21, 2007(2007-01-21)[41] March 29, 2015
transformers_text: 294 31 Resounding Bad News Buster Call Invoked Transliteration Hi b iki wataru Ky h Hat sud Bas ut K ru Japanese Hiroyuki Kaku d Koga Naoki January 21 2007 2007 01 21 41 March 29 2015 At the Courthouse Plaza the marines defeat O imo and K sh and capture the Straw Hats ' allies in the courthouse Almost on the Bridge of Hesitation which leads through the Gates of Justice Span dam tries to contact the CP 9 members at the tower to know what is going on with the pirates But he learns too late that he accidentally invoked the Buster Call causing ten battleships and five vice admirals to be dispatched to Eni es Lobby from the nearby navy headquarters As Robin attempts to reason with him of what will happen to Eni es Lobby once the Buster Call is invoked Span dam makes another mistake by informing the whole island of the coming threat while admitting that he does not care if the 10 000 navy soldiers under him are obliterated in process This causes the navy soldiers to leave their prisoners and flee to the coast With the Buster Call underway the CP 9 operatives decide to end their respective matches quickly while Luffy begins his fight against Lucci
